members.signatureBeforeChange: boolean sendKeyEvent (int type, int msg, int wParam, int lParam, Event event)
members.signatureAfterChange: boolean sendKeyEvent (int type, int msg, int wParam, int lParam, Event event)
diff: -	/* Disable all magic keys that could modify the text */
+	* Disable all magic keys that could modify the text
+	* and don't send events when Alt, Shift or Ctrl is
+			if ((stateMask & SWT.ALT | SWT.SHIFT | SWT.CONTROL) != 0) return false;
-	* If the left button is down, the text widget
+	* If the left button is down, the text widget refuses the character.

members.signatureBeforeChange: Point minimumSize (int wHint, int hHint, boolean flushCache)
members.signatureAfterChange: Point minimumSize (int wHint, int hHint, boolean flushCache)
